title: Study
data:
- *For obtaining or refreshing knowledge of spells, see [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook").*

**Study** is a status [property](/wiki/Property "Property") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"). It can be inflicted by monster attack effects, as well as the use of specific items.

## Description

A [hero](/wiki/Hero "Hero") or monster subjected to an attack with the study property will become **studied** - this increases the accuracy and damage of attacks against a "studied" target for a certain amount of turns while reducing their effective [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and [damage reduction](/wiki/DR "DR"). The damage dice of a study attack determines both the amount of turns that the target is considered studied for *and* the amount of extra damage taken from attacks; the amount is also added as a flat bonus modifier to accuracy for monsters attacking a studied target.

## Sources

Study occurs with the following attacks, weapons, spells, and items:

- The [gaze attack](/wiki/Gaze_attack "Gaze attack") of:

  - All [autons](/wiki/Auton "Auton") (1d11 + 1 for each "tier" of auton above the monoton)
  - [Axus](/wiki/Axus "Axus") (1d20)
  - [eye of doom](/wiki/Eye_of_doom "Eye of doom") (8d8)
  - [aphanactonan assessor](/index.php?title=Aphanactonan_assessor\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aphanactonan assessor (page does not exist)") (1d20)
  - [Jrt Netjer](/wiki/Jrt_Netjer "Jrt Netjer") (3d7)
  - [Stannumach Rilmani](/wiki/Stannumach_Rilmani "Stannumach Rilmani") (1d20)
  - [yochlol](/wiki/Yochlol "Yochlol") (1d20)
  - [Bael](/wiki/Bael "Bael") (1d9)
  - [hateful whispers](/index.php?title=Hateful_whispers\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Hateful whispers (page does not exist)") (4d8)
  - [legionnaire](/index.php?title=Legionnaire\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Legionnaire (page does not exist)") (1d6)
  - [Legion](/wiki/Legion "Legion") (1d9)
  - [arcadian avenger](/wiki/Arcadian_avenger "Arcadian avenger") (2d6)
  - [operator](/index.php?title=Operator\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Operator (page does not exist)") (1d5)
  - [commander](/index.php?title=Commander\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Commander (page does not exist)") (2d5)
  - [truth-seer](/index.php?title=Truth-seer\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Truth-seer (page does not exist)") (1d15)
  - [dream-eater](/index.php?title=Dream-eater\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Dream-eater (page does not exist)") (1d15)
  - [veil-render](/index.php?title=Veil-render\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Veil-render (page does not exist)") (1d15)

- The prayer of a [dread seraph](/wiki/Dread_seraph "Dread seraph") when crazed or below 1⁄4 of maximum HP, which sets your studied stack equal to its monster level after 5 turns along with fully healing itself

- Weapons:

  - [The Lifehunt Scythe](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Lifehunt_Scythe "DNetHack artifacts") (inflicts cumulative study based on damage dealt to a target monster: 1⁄2 of damage dealt on that target, and 1⁄4 of damage dealt on the wielder)
  - [Bestial claw](/index.php?title=Bestial_claw\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Bestial claw (page does not exist)") (inflicts [insight](/wiki/Insight "Insight")-based amount of study)
  - Crow talons (+3 study per hit)
  - Crow quills (+4 study per hit)
  - Any normal [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") used in the Makashi [lightsaber form](/wiki/Lightsaber_form "Lightsaber form") (adds skill-based level of study to targets)
  - Mind blasts from a weapon with the ["deep" object property](/wiki/Object_properties#dNetHack "Object properties") at +2 or lower enchantment (sets studied status for monsters to a length equal to the damage done, unless that is lower than their current studied duration)

- Other objects
  - [Vilya](/wiki/Vilya "Vilya") (adds +1d20 study to all attacks while worn)

## Messages

- - <[Foo](/wiki/Foo "Foo")> studies you carefully.
  - \<Foo> studies you with a level stare.

  A monster used a studying gaze on you.

Study

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For obtaining or refreshing knowledge of spells, see spellbook.

Study is a status property that appears in dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack. It can be inflicted by monster attack effects, as well as the use of specific items.

Description

A hero or monster subjected to an attack with the study property will become studied - this increases the accuracy and damage of attacks against a "studied" target for a certain amount of turns while reducing their effective AC and damage reduction. The damage dice of a study attack determines both the amount of turns that the target is considered studied for and the amount of extra damage taken from attacks; the amount is also added as a flat bonus modifier to accuracy for monsters attacking a studied target.

Sources

Study occurs with the following attacks, weapons, spells, and items:

  • The gaze attack of:
    • All autons (1d11 + 1 for each "tier" of auton above the monoton)
    • Axus (1d20)
    • eye of doom (8d8)
    • aphanactonan assessor (1d20)
    • Jrt Netjer (3d7)
    • Stannumach Rilmani (1d20)
    • yochlol (1d20)
    • Bael (1d9)
    • hateful whispers (4d8)
    • legionnaire (1d6)
    • Legion (1d9)
    • arcadian avenger (2d6)
    • operator (1d5)
    • commander (2d5)
    • truth-seer (1d15)
    • dream-eater (1d15)
    • veil-render (1d15)
  • The prayer of a dread seraph when crazed or below 1⁄4 of maximum HP, which sets your studied stack equal to its monster level after 5 turns along with fully healing itself
  • Weapons:
    • The Lifehunt Scythe (inflicts cumulative study based on damage dealt to a target monster: 1⁄2 of damage dealt on that target, and 1⁄4 of damage dealt on the wielder)
    • Bestial claw (inflicts insight-based amount of study)
    • Crow talons (+3 study per hit)
    • Crow quills (+4 study per hit)
    • Any normal lightsaber used in the Makashi lightsaber form (adds skill-based level of study to targets)
    • Mind blasts from a weapon with the "deep" object property at +2 or lower enchantment (sets studied status for monsters to a length equal to the damage done, unless that is lower than their current studied duration)
  • Other objects
    • Vilya (adds +1d20 study to all attacks while worn)

Messages

<Foo> studies you carefully.
<Foo> studies you with a level stare.
A monster used a studying gaze on you.
